heading: Today
text: Morning clouds giving way to increasing sun Champlain Valley and south. A few flurries, mostly cloudy northeast.

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Becoming mostly clear, except clouds northeast.

heading: Wednesday
text: Morning clouds northeast, then partly to mostly sunny.
temperature: Mid 30s to mid 40s, north to south

heading: Thursday
temperature: Mid 30s to mid 40s, north to south
